p: Field emission SEM was undertaken on a Joel 7100 JSM. Energy Dispersive Spectrometry (EDS) of relative element abundances measured in spot, area and element mapping modes using an Oxford X-Max 80 probe and Aztec software. Sections of the collected spall flakes were mounted on stubs (face-up, face-down and in cross section where possible) and gold coated to facilitate the analysis of both the case-hardened outer surfaces and the underlying salt covered surfaces being mechanically pushed free of the limestone massive.
